Reading data

read method gets the content associated with the given key.

Example

print(await cache.read('one'));

Usage in route

Here is an example showing how to use read during read operation on a resource.

@Get(path: '/:id')
Future> getById(Context ctx) async {
  final String id = ctx.pathParams.id;

  Book book;
  try {
    book = cache.read(id);
  } catch(e) {
    final db = ctx.getInput(MongoDb);
    final bean = new BookBean(db);
    book = await bean.getById(id);
    cache.upsert(id, book);
  }
  return toJson(book);
}
>
